product_name: Wilderness Systems Tarpon 160 Angler Sit-On-Top Kayak with Rudder
long_description: Decked out with a rod holder and lots of room for fishing gear, the Wilderness Systems Tarpon 160 Angler Sit-On-Top Kayak with Rudder covers long distances in search of fish with smooth-paddling ease. 16 ft. length offers excellent speed and high stability in choppy water, and high capacity means you can take all your gear with you. Hull is crafted in high-density polyethylene to provide rugged durability and easy care. Seat and back pads use soft, contoured foam covered in a textured stretch material for plush comfort and protection from the cold. Scalloped, contoured seat pan cradles and cushions legs, and backrest conforms to size of paddler and flexes a bit with every paddle stroke. Leg lifter uses handle to shore up space below your legs; back strap lowers seat back, and the angle of back rest is adjustable as well. Foot-pedal-controlled rudder system with cockpit deployment controls helps you steer and track effectively. Small gear bag under seat features a gear clip and enough capacity for a water bottle or extra food. Dual Slide-Trax rail system at front of seating area and tank well can attach compatible accessories (not included) without tools or complicated adjustments. Adjustable Keepers footbraces; center and bow hatch with locking levers; 83 lb. weight.
short_description: Decked out with a rod holder and lots of room for fishing gear, the Wilderness Systems Tarpon 160 Angler Sit-On-Top Kayak with Rudder covers long distances in search of fish with smooth-paddling ease.
